General.Name: Zhongbai Holdings Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongbai Holdings Group Co.,Ltd engages in the supermarket chain business. It also operates electrical appliance, and department and convenience stores, as well as cold chain distribution centers. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Zhongbai Group Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Jun  Cheng
3.Title: Gen. Mang. of Supply Chain Management
